taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Adults occur in rocky areas of rapidly flowing waters.  Feed on worms, crustaceans, insects and plant matter (Ref. 7020), and fish.  Oviparous (Ref. 205).  Distinct pairs breed on densely grown weedy places (Ref. 205).  Breeding takes place from December to May.  Sexually mature at 15 cm (Ref. 12225).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Amazon River basin: Brazil, French Guiana, Peru and Suriname.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: South America:  Amazon River basin.
